General.Name: Lithium Energi Exploration Inc
General.Description: Lithium Energi Exploration Inc. engages in the acquisition, exploration, and evaluating of lithium properties in Argentina. It holds interest in the Laguna Caro project that covers an area of approximately 17,759 hectares; the Antofalla North project, which covers an area of approximately 41,496 hectares; and the Antofalla South project that covers an area of approximately 69,112 hectares located in Argentina. The company was formerly known as Portola Resources Inc. and changed its name to Lithium Energi Exploration Inc. in March 2017. Lithium Energi Exploration Inc. was incorporated in 1998 and is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: TD Canada Trust Tower, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5J 2S1
